src_original: tṛtīyasvaraḥ (tasya)  śiraso bhūṣitañca tattvaketarasvarūpam |  pāvakasya bījam i-(kāreṇa)
(66) VIII ta-mantro hi dvisaṁyogaḥ pa-sthiti agni-pavana-bījaṁ mahāsukha-rāgaḥ |
tasya ( pa-vargasya)  dvitīya-bījam akāra-pūritaṁ mahācaturdhātusvarūpakaṁ hi |  pa-(akṣaram) ra-(akṣaram)
ma-dvayaṁ hā-dvayaṁ bhaṇitavyaṁ hara hara iti moha-svabhāvaḥ |
ta-syāntaṁ hi akṣaram i-yuktakaṁ niḥsvābhāvaḥ sarvaḥ |
ya-antaṁ hi dastraṁ kramikañca jñānaṁ pavitram |
(84-85) na-mantro hi tṛtīyasvareṇa śirasi bhūṣitaśca nivartitaṁ dharmādharma-svarūpam |
